mapper.select:
select
from member_contact_time_relation t inner join contact_time_dict b on t.did=b.id where id = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.is_del=0
mapper.insert: insert into member_contact_time_relation (member_card, did, create_time, creator) values (#{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into member_contact_time_relation (member_card, did, create_time, creator) values
(#{item.memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into member_contact_time_relation
member_card,
did,
create_time,
creator,
#{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update member_contact_time_relation
member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
